title: Person
description:
An adult with no gender specified. This emoji may be used to talk about adults in a gender-inclusive way.

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the generic person emoji is rendered as a simplified, yet approachable human figure with smooth, rounded contours and a neutral expression. Appleâ€™s signature glossy finish and subtle lighting give the figure a friendly, welcoming presence, making it a universal symbol for an individual, a user, or simply a placeholder for human representation in digital communication. Its clean design ensures clarity and broad applicability across various contexts.
